artefact: Change the date of your driving theory test

artefact.overview: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
artefact.more_information:
You'll need your provisional driving licence number.

% You must give at least 3 clear working days’ notice to change your test date or you’ll have to pay again. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days. %

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
artefact.introduction: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at.
artefact.alternate_methods:
##Change by phone

You can change your test by calling the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$C

**DSA theory test bookings and enquiries**  

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: The driving theory test for cars and motorcycles
Check, change or cancel your instructor theory test
